participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and reflective, Emily enjoys reminiscing about her past while actively supporting her daughter’s achievements.
participant_1.background: I remember dancing to the music of Katy Perry in my room when I was younger. My daughter just graduated high school ranked at the top of her class. I got married in a park to celebrate my love of nature. My first bike was a hand-me-down from my older brother. I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Jake loves sharing his interests and finding common ground with others.
participant_2.background: I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time! After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows. I start an internship in engineering later this year. I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together. I spend my evening creating the perfect music playlist.

content.text: What was your favorite concert you ever went to?
I really enjoyed seeing the band Twenty One Pilots a few years ago.
I like them too! I saw them a few years ago as well. Their live shows are great.
Yes, they really are. I love the energy they bring to the stage.
Me too. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I listen to a lot of different types of music, but I mostly listen to rock and pop.
I like those genres too. I also like to listen to country music sometimes.
Really? I'm not a big fan of country music.
I know it's not for everyone. What about anime? Do you watch any?
I love anime! I watch it all the time.
Me too! I love how creative and imaginative anime can be.
Yes, it's so different from American cartoons.
Right? I love that about it.
I'm glad you like anime too. We should talk about it sometime.
That sounds like a great idea!
